altername_name: Jim Henson's Bear in the Big Blue House
name: Bear in the Big Blue House
overview: Based on the popular children's TV series, Bear in the Big Blue House lets players learn by solving age-appropriate puzzles in Bear's colorful world. Bear's friends Tutter, Treelo, Pip and Pop, and Ojo join in the fun. One of the few games rated EC (Early Childhood) by the Entertainment Software Rating Board, Bear in the Big Blue House is designed for children between the ages of 2 and 7.
